I Specialize In

Photography as well as creating digital masterpieces and cinematic visuals that blend creativity with technology

Concepting

Transform abstact ideas into clear visual. i work on developing and refining creative ideas to become clear, definitive visual with purpose and mood before production begins.

Editing

Selecting and retouching best images, color correction, exposure, cropping, filters, adding motion graphics, subtitles/effects, refining timing, easing, transitions are all what I do.

Visual Design

Make my work revolve around crafting appealing and functional layouts that guide attention, convey emotion and enhance overall user experience bridging the gap between graphics and UI design.

Interaction

Designing purposeful engagement between users and visuals using motion, timing and responsiveness while guiding users seamlessly through content, action and visual storytelling elements.

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hi, I'm Nimatallah, a creative visual storyteller and founder of SceNims - a brand built on the art of turning everyday moments into cinematic experiences. I specialize in videography, photography, and motion graphics design, crafting visuals that speak emotion, purpose, and depth. For me, storytelling isn't just about capturing a scene - it's about making every frame feel alive. My journey began with a passion for technology and visual art. Over time, I've learned to merge technical precision with artistic expression â€” using light, color, sound, and motion to bring ideas to life. Whether it's a short film, brand video, event coverage, or motion design sequence, I approach every project with the goal of creating something timeless, meaningful, and memorable. Through SceNims, I've worked on projects that range from product and event shoots to creative promotional visuals. My process involves concepting, direction, and post-production ensuring that each visual aligns perfectly with the client's message. I believe strong visuals can connect people, evoke emotion, and inspire action - and that's exactly what I aim to achieve in every project. When I'm not behind the camera or editing screen, I'm exploring new storytelling techniques, experimenting with lighting styles, or learning new tools that push my creativity forward. I see every project as a collaboration - a chance to blend imagination with purpose and tell stories that stay with people long after they've watched them. Welcome to my world of Cinematic Scenes - where every frame has a heartbeat, and every story finds its voice.

My Creative Process

All of my projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Every creative process begins with an idea waiting to be brought to life. Concepting is where imagination takes shape through brainstorming, research, and exploration of visual themes. At this stage, mood boards, sketches, and creative briefs help translate thoughts into visual possibilities. The goal is to define what the visual should communicate, how it should feel, and what lasting impression it should leave.

2

Pre-Production ^ Planning

This is the stage where creativity meets organization. Once the concept is defined, planning ensures that every detail supports the vision. Every creative choice, from tone to composition is made deliberately to align with the project's emotion and purpose.

3

Pre-Production ^ Planning

This is the stage where creativity meets organization. Once the concept is defined, planning ensures that every detail supports the vision. Every creative choice, from tone to composition is made deliberately to align with the project's emotion and purpose.

4

Refinement

After creation comes refinement â€” the process of transforming raw material into a polished masterpiece. It's a stage of patience and precision, where small adjustments elevate the visual narrative. The focus is on bringing harmony between the vision and the final emotion each viewer should feel.
